direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve loan transactions (borrowing and repaying) with similar parameter handling and request structures.
Both methods involve loan repayment operations and share similar control flows and parameter handling.
Both methods handle loan repayments but differ in the type of loan (flexible vs. standard). Test cases for one can be adapted for the other.
Both methods involve modifying loan-related parameters (repayment and LTV adjustment) and share similar resource access patterns.
Both methods handle loan-related operations and may encounter similar exceptions related to loan parameters and conditions.
